original_text: Their arrows are sharp. Their bows are ready to shoot. Their horses' feet are as hard as stones. The wheels of their chariots go round very fast.
korean_text: 그들의 화살은 날카롭고 모든 활은 당겨졌으며 그들의 말굽은 부싯돌 같고 병거 바퀴는 회오리바람 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Their bows are ready to shoot.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 활은 쏠 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: Their horses' feet are as hard as stones.
The wheels of their chariots go round very fast.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 전차 바퀴는 매우 빠르게 돌아간다.
